## Julia

```julia
function FizzBuzz(num)
  if num % 15 == 0
    println("FizzBuzz")
  elseif num % 5 == 0
    println("Buzz")
  elseif num % 3 == 0
    println("Fizz")
  else
    println(num)
  end
end
```
:::
